item.title: The morning rituals of turbo-strivers are entertainment, not inspiration
item.description: Meditation at 5am followed by a run, an ice bath and a blast of physio is a masochistic practice best contemplated at leisure

item.title: UK’s dramatic revoking of EU employment law will collide with reality
item.description: Courts will be pushed into political judgments on rights while employers and workers are left dealing with uncertainty

item.description: A deal for the 146-year-old conglomerate would be the biggest buyout in Japanese corporate history

item.description: Fewer than half the pandemic-era start-ups in the sector are still alive, with Gorillas the latest to come under threat

item.description: In a week of global chaos, the bird-shaped clutch bag is a cherished piece of daft

item.description: The hijab has gone through many iterations in Iranian history but more and more are now confident voicing their discontent

item.description: The president has sidelined rivals and abandoned collective leadership to reign alone and unchallenged
